alert.note: Alert for Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 06 at 1:57PM PST until November 07 at 7:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Clark and Southern Nye County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Hazardous crosswinds likely on US-95. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on US-95. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Western Clark and Southern Nye County
